Articles.Content:
So hi there......

played kerbal space program for a year or so now..... 0.9 or 0.8 I think?

Well anyway I\'m a big fan of silly competitions that require a couple days of slamming into the ground to accomplish.... I have used mods like MECHjeb and that other command and control mod (the name escapes me) but I\'m not really a fan.

Also my favourite thing is to see some form of mothership or a reusable launch vehicle as I cant build them myself but I want to learn.

Anyways that pretty much sums me up so yea. I hope i get to know you all and become good friends!

-Adam

(BF is infinity better than any call of duty game excluding cod 4 which was meh)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

fnord

Wow you are very quick in your reply

I commend you!

The Capt\'n has an extra sense when it comes to the welcome aboard thread. We think his hair stands on end when somebody hits Enter and he goes into a trance like state(he also has a built in Microprocessor). He\'s the fastest welcomer in the west. But jokes aside, welcome to the forums and you\'ll love all the available info. I also agree with BF being the better game than COD.

Welcome to the forums.

I have been playing just as long as you (still haven\'t gone to the mun though). Have a good time.

PS: I wouldn\'t buy eather. The earlier BF and CODs were better than the current ones, more fun too.

Hello, welcome (or maybe you should be saying that to me ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) )!

PS I agree that the earlier ones were better. favorite is my trusty partner in gaming - BF 1942!

Never let me down. still want to play Battle of Britain. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> The Capt\'n has an extra sense when it comes to the welcome aboard thread. We think his hair stands on end when somebody hits Enter and he goes into a trance like state(he also has a built in Microprocessor). He\'s the fastest welcomer in the west. But jokes aside, welcome to the forums and you\'ll love all the available info. I also agree with BF being the better game than COD.

Nah, I\'ve beaten him once or twice.
